text: Chirk Community Hospital () is a community hospital in Chirk, Wales. It is managed by the Betsi Cadwaladr University Health Board. ==History== The hospital has its origins in the Chirk and District Cottage Hospital which was financed by local miners and opened in 1921. It joined the National Health Service in 1948 and became the Chirk and District Hospital in 1955. It was rebuilt on the same site and reopened as the Chirk Community Hospital in 1990. ==References== Category:NHS hospitals in Wales Category:Hospitals established in 1921 Category:Hospital buildings completed in 1990 Category:Hospitals in Wrexham County Borough Category:Chirk Category:Betsi Cadwaladr University Health Board
